trans-unit.source: Stores ASP.NET page view state on the Web client in a hidden HTML element.
ASP.NET pages can store <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state between the inherently stateless HTTP request and response required to process and serve any Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可以存储 ASP.NET 页面<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>之间本质上是无状态的 HTTP 请求和响应处理和提供任何网页所需状态。

trans-unit.source: This state is called "view state".
The default mechanism used to store view state for a page and its controls is in one or more `<hidden>` HTML fields included in the page that is served to a client from a Web server.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储页面和其控件的视图状态的默认机制是在一个或多个`<hidden>`从 Web 服务器提供给客户端的页面中包含的 HTML 字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class to do this work.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>类来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Save%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Load%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> can store state in a `<hidden>` HTML element named "__VIEWSTATE" on a Web client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> 实现<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Save%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Load%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>可以存储在状态`<hidden>`名为"__VIEWSTATE"Web 客户端上的 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: When the client requests the same page from the Web server (a postback), the `<hidden>` element is parsed and converted to state information by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端请求同一页上，从 Web 服务器 （回发），`<hidden>`分析元素并将其转换为状态信息的 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance that is requested has an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> class, it retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object from this adapter using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.GetStatePersister%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>请求的实例都有一个相关<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>类，它将检索<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>从此适配器使用的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.GetStatePersister%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Adapters can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.GetStatePersister%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object that stores page and control state in some way that a specific client supports.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写适配器<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.GetStatePersister%2A>方法以返回<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>将页和控件的状态存储在特定的客户端支持某些方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class stores page and controls' state on the Web server, instead of the client, to decrease the amount of information that must be sent and stored on a client that has potentially limited memory and bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>类将页和控件的状态存储在 Web 服务器上，而不是客户端，减少了必须发送和存储在客户端可能具有有限的内存和带宽的信息。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the "_VIEWSTATE" `<hidden>` HTML element can be set through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> property or through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> configuration setting.
trans-unit.target: "_VIEWSTATE"的最大大小`<hidden>`可通过设置 HTML 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>属性或通过<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>配置设置。

trans-unit.source: When this value is set and the length of the "_VIEWSTATE" element would exceed the maximum length, the content is divided into multiple "_VIEWSTATE" elements.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此值和"_VIEWSTATE"元素的长度将超过最大长度时，内容被划分多个"_VIEWSTATE"元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control to data in a database with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件添加到与数据库中的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the example page is viewed, any view state is stored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class in a `<hidden>` HTML element named "__VIEWSTATE".
trans-unit.target: 当查看示例页时，则在任何视图状态存储<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>类`<hidden>`名为"__VIEWSTATE"的 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> that the view state persistence mechanism is created for.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister" /> class.
Deserializes and loads persisted state information from an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object initializes its control hierarchy.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Load%2A> method to load page and control state information from an incoming request to the Web server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>类实现<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Load%2A>方法以从传入的请求的页和控件的状态信息加载到 Web 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> object accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.StateFormatter%2A> property is used to deserialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>访问的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.StateFormatter%2A>属性用于反序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Load" /> method could not successfully deserialize the state information contained in the request to the Web server.

Serializes any object state contained in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" /> or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ControlState" /> property and writes the state to the response stream.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Save%2A> method to persist page and control state to a client by writing it to a `<hidden>` HTML element in the outgoing response to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister.Save%2A>方法以写入到保留给客户端的页和控件状态`<hidden>`到客户端的传出响应中的 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> object accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.StateFormatter%2A> property is used to deserialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>访问的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.StateFormatter%2A>属性用于反序列化数据。
